articles.description: Slovakian swimmer Tamara Potocka is receiving medical treatment after collapsing following her 200m medley heat at La Defense Arena.
articles.title: Olympic swimming: Slovakian Tamara Potocka collapses after race

articles.description: Britain's Oliver Wynne-Griffiths and Tom George are pipped on the line as they miss out on men's pair gold in agonising fashion.
articles.title: Olympic rowing: Great Britain win men's pair silver in dramatic final

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Latest transfers news and Premier League pre-season updates, including Man Utd boss Erik ten Hag interview.
articles.title: Transfer news live, pre-season updates & Ten Hag interview

articles.description: Jack Laugher and Anthony Harding claim a fine bronze for Great Britain in synchronised 3m springboard diving at the Olympic Games in Paris.
articles.title: Olympics diving: Jack Laugher and Anthony Harding win bronze for GB in men's synchronised 3m springboard final

articles.description: Adam Peaty will not take part in the mixed 4x100m medley relay heats on Friday morning, as Team GB begin the defence of their Olympic title.
articles.title: Olympic swimming: Adam Peaty misses mixed relay medley after Covid-19 diagnosis

articles.description: Great Britain's Josh Kerr and Olympic 1500m gold medal rival Jakob Ingebrigtsen both progress from their heats at the Stade de France.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Josh Kerr and 1500m gold medal rival Jakob Ingebrigtsen progress

articles.description: Andy Murray was understandably emotional as his illustrious career came to a close at the Paris 2024 Olympics - but he wasn't the only one.
articles.title: Andy Murray retirement: Tears everywhere as British sporting icon ends career at Paris 2024

articles.description: Team GB's rowers clinched three more medals on day six in Paris, while Andy Murray and Dan Evans continue their doubles campaign later.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Three medals for Team GB rowers on day six
